title: When is Wayfair’s ‘Way Day’ 2021? What time does it start? What is it? Here’s everything you need to know.
body: Here’s everything you need to know about “Way Day” 2021. (Photo courtesy of Wayfair)Online furniture giant Wayfair has announced that its highly anticipated .The mega two-day shopping event appears to be back on its usual schedule. Last year, “Way Day” took place in September, most likely due to the coronavirus pandemic.Here’s everything you need to know about “Way Day” 2021.Way Day is Wayfair’s “biggest sale of the year,” where you can take advantage of .Similar to  extremely popular Prime Day, flash deals will take place throughout the event.
